Author: happyarlene
Text: It's probably a plateau, the best you can do is change it up (exercise, food) and eat at least 1200 calories for a while!! (only if you're up for it boo but please take care of yourself)

Author: terriblelizerd
Text: i’m in the exact same position and idk what’s happening. water weight? food weight? is my metabolism just that fucked up now? i might try eating 1000-1200 for a couple days (low volume high cal foods like pb so that i don’t freak out about the scale going up too much) and then going back down. sometimes that gets me past a plateau.
